title: Ankle-Length Fluid Maxi Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of an ankle-length maxi dress, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims, soft drape, slight A-line silhouette, short flutter sleeves, V-neckline, concealed side zipper, lightweight woven fabric
style_fit: relaxed fit through body, gently fitted at waist
techpack: Ankle-length A-line maxi dress with short flutter sleeves, V-neckline, concealed side zipper on left seam, self-fabric waist tie, topstitching detail at neckline and hem, lightweight rayon shell with cotton blend lining, finished hem length 58 inches from shoulder.
provenance: Inspired by the commercial ankle-length trend for versatile day-to-evening wear.
